title: The key US-Saudi deals you may have missed
text:
The key US-Saudi deals you may have missed

1 trillion dollars. President Trump would have you believe that’s the headline of Saudi Crown Prince’s visit to Washington - but MBS will see this trip as a massive win both symbolically and substantively. CNN's Becky Anderson digs into the White House read out about this deepening partnership - there are a lot of big promises on key files of interest to the kingdom: A-I, critical minerals, civil nuclear cooperation and defense.
